items.title: Self-invoking code benchmarks help you decide which LLMs to use for your programming tasks
items.description: LLMs are good at coding simple functions. But how good are they at calling their own functions to solve complex problems?

items.title: LlamaIndex goes beyond RAG so agents can make complex decisions
items.description: A new orchestration architecture from LlamaIndex brings more context and decision-making capabilities to AI agents.

items.title: Microsoft’s new rStar-Math technique upgrades small models to outperform OpenAI’s o1-preview at math problems
items.description: Phi-4 and an rStar-Math paper suggest that compact, specialized models can provide powerful alternatives to the industry’s largest systems.

items.title: Diffbot’s AI model doesn’t guess — it knows, thanks to a trillion-fact knowledge graph
items.description: Diffbot challenges AI giants with a breakthrough open-source language model that outperforms ChatGPT and Google Gemini by prioritizing real-time fact ...

items.title: How Narvar is using AI and data to enhance post-purchase customer experiences
items.description: How Narvar's new tech is using AI to harness the power of 42 billion consumer interactions a year to improve retail operations.
